title: Understanding BDD
text: Body Dysmorphic Disorder (BDD) is a mental health condition. It involves an obsessive focus on a perceived flaw in appearance, which might be minor or imagined. This preoccupation can cause significant distress and impact daily functioning.

hintAnswer: mental disorder in which a person is preoccupied with perceived defects or flaws in their appearance
title: Identifying BDD
text: Which of the following best describes Body Dysmorphic Disorder?
choices: mental disorder in which a person is preoccupied with perceived defects or flaws in their appearance
mental health condition characterized by persistent difficulty discarding or parting with possessions
mental health disorder characterized by a chronic need to pull out one’s hair
